amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-785 to provide an additional $6 million for the Department of Defense's Lung Cancer Research Program and decreases the Operations and Maintenance, Defense-wide account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Nolan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
